mdRecord.dcterms:title: A voyage of discovery to the North Pacific ocean, and round the world: in which the coast of north-west America has been carefully examined and accurately surveyed / Undertaken by His Majesty's command, principally with a view to ascertain the existence of any navigable communication between the North Pacific and North Atlantic oceans; and performed in the years 1790, 1791, 1792, 1793, 1794 and 1795, in the Discovery sloop of war, and armed tender Chatham, under the command of Captain George Vancouver
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Vancouver, George, 1757-1798
Vancouver, John, -1828?
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for G. G. and J. Robinson, and J. Edwards.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: Atlas of 16 plates (incl. 6 fold. charts) 58 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: Atlas of 16 plates (incl. 6 fold. charts) 58 cm
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Atlas shelved with McGregor Flat Folios

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: G420 .V22 1798: Proof copy, or 1st issue, with all plates and maps included in folio volume. Vol. 1 has "A list of the plates contained in the folio volume" (Plates 1-34). Original drab boards (Atlas rebacked), with paper labels on spine; binder's label of Tuck in Atlas volume. An ALS from John Vancouver, dated 23d August, 1798, which was laid in, has been transferred to Manuscripts. The letter discusses distribution of a first impression and 9 proof copies of the book. This copy of the book is signed by H. Humphreys, who as listed in the letter as a recipient of a proof copy. Paul Mellon Bequest, May 12, 2000.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: A 1798 .V34: Later printing, with lists of plates redone: Vol. 1 has: A list of the plates contained in the first volume. With directions to the binder. (Plates I-VII); with "A list of the plates contained in the folio volume" (Plates 1-16) printed on verso. Vol. 2 has List of plates I-V. Vol. 3 has List of plates I-VI. Plates with Roman numerals are bound in the volumes indicated.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mellon, Paul--Library--Personal copy.
